TEXT.English: [TAB]Armenian militia better known as Fedayee, is a term referring to Armenian guerrillas who voluntarily leave their families in order to fight for Armenians. The term fedayee was also used by Armenian guerrillas in the Ottoman Empire before and during the First World War, who defended Armenians from persecution. The term was widely used and is still used to describe the volunteers, and can be found in literature and songs.
